languages.text: "И то правда, не стоит здесь задерживаться, вдруг еще мятежники пожалуют. Пойду поищу безопасное местечко, буду за небом следить, приземляющиеся шаттлы высматривать. Пусть вас защитит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: "И то правда, не стоит здесь задерживаться, вдруг еще мятежники пожалуют. Пойду поищу безопасное местечко, буду за небом следить, приземляющиеся шаттлы высматривать. Пусть вас защитит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

languages.text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."
languages.original_text: "И то правда, не стоит здесь задерживаться, вдруг еще мятежники пожалуют. Пойду поищу безопасное местечко, буду за небом следить, приземляющиеся шаттлы высматривать. Пусть вас защитит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here. We don't want to run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

"You're right, we shouldn't stay here. We don't want to run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

"You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

"You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

"You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

"You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, wir sollten nicht hierbleiben, sonst laufen wir vielleicht Rebellen in die Arme. Ich gehe eine sichere Stelle suchen, von der aus wir Ausschau nach Shuttles im Landeanflug halten können. Möge der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Euch beschützen, {mf|Lord|Lady}."
languages.original_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, wir sollten nicht hierbleiben, sonst laufen wir vielleicht Rebellen in die Arme. Ich gehe eine sichere Stelle suchen, von der aus wir Ausschau nach Shuttles im Landeanflug halten können. Möge der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Euch beschützen, {mf|Lord|Lady}."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, il ne faut pas rester ici, sans quoi nous risquons de croiser d'autres rebelles. Je vais me trouver un endroit sûr d'où surveiller le ciel et voir si des navettes tentent d'atterrir... Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}empereur{/g} vous protège, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, il ne faut pas rester ici, sans quoi nous risquons de croiser d'autres rebelles. Je vais me trouver un endroit sûr d'où surveiller le ciel et voir si des navettes tentent d'atterrir... Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}empereur{/g} vous protège, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: “您说得对，我们不应该留在这里，这里可能会遇到叛军。我去找个安全的地方，看看天上有没有要着陆的穿梭机。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑您，大人。”
languages.original_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: “您说得对，我们不应该留在这里，这里可能会遇到叛军。我去找个安全的地方，看看天上有没有要着陆的穿梭机。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑您，大人。”

languages.text: 「それがいいです、ここに留まるべきじゃありません。暴徒と出くわすかもしれないんですから。僕は安全な場所を探して、着陸するシャトルが来ないか空を見てます。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の加護が陛下にあらんことを」
languages.original_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: 「それがいいです、ここに留まるべきじゃありません。暴徒と出くわすかもしれないんですから。僕は安全な場所を探して、着陸するシャトルが来ないか空を見てます。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の加護が閣下にあらんことを」

languages.text: «Tiene razón, no deberíamos quedarnos aquí o podríamos encontrarnos con rebeldes. Buscaré un lugar seguro para vigilar el cielo por si aterrizan lanzaderas. Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le proteja, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, no deberíamos quedarnos aquí o podríamos encontrarnos con rebeldes. Buscaré un lugar seguro para vigilar el cielo por si aterrizan lanzaderas. Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le proteja, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: "Haklısınız, burada oyalanırsak isyancılarla karşılaşabiliriz. Gökyüzünü izleyip inecek mekikleri gözlemek için güvenli bir yer bulacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} sizi korusun {mf|lordum|leydim}."
languages.original_text: "You're right, we shouldn't stay here or we might run into rebels. I'll go find a safe place to watch the sky for any landing shuttles. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısınız, burada oyalanırsak isyancılarla karşılaşabiliriz. Gökyüzünü izleyip inecek mekikleri gözlemek için güvenli bir yer bulacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} sizi korusun {mf|lordum|leydim}."
